citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A female Shih Tzu born 7/4/23 (microchip ID # 900215005361790) was lethargic, had somewhat labored breathing, and
had diarrhea. The licensee observed and isolated the dog last night, but had not contacted the attending veterinarian. Not
contacting the Attending Veterinarian and treating per his/her instructions doesn't ensure the dog is receiving adequate
veterinarian care. The dog is displaying symptoms indicating it is in some sort of distress and is in need of medical
treatment. The attending veterinarian must be contacted and treated per his/her instructions. Correct starting on 8/20/25.
Note: The attending veterinarian was contacted and treated during inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(2)  Direct
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A female Shih Tzu born 7/4/23 (microchip ID # 900215005361790) was lethargic, had somewhat labored breathing, and 
had diarrhea. The licensee observed and isolated the dog last night, but had not contacted the attending veterinarian. Not 
contacting the Attending Veterinarian and treating per his/her instructions doesn't ensure the dog is receiving adequate 
veterinarian care. The dog is displaying symptoms indicating it is in some sort of distress and is in need of medical 
treatment. The attending veterinarian must be contacted and treated per his/her instructions. Correct starting on 8/20/25. 
 
Note: The attending veterinarian was contacted and treated during inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
